channel.title: 317 or 508?
channel.description:
What in your mind is easier and more fun to code? 317 or 508?
Which is easier: Why it is easier: Favorite thing to code in the version:
Which is easier: 508 Why it is easier: I don't really know it just is i feel that it is more orginized and easier for me to find stuff. Favorite thing to code in the version: I like editing the NPC's dialogue and rewards because i can get really creative with things like that. :]

item.title: 317 or 508?

item.title: 317 or 508?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:1, topic:363059”]I prefer 317

The character of Decent Non wL Servers are what makes me like them

Mostly i like the classic feeling and its actually like Middle Ages

With 508 the graphics kinda make it seem a bit more our time

But i also like 508 because of content and minigames[/quote]

Name one server you know that isn’t based off of wnterlove.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 or 508?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

R A R E S:

Favorite thing to code in the version: I like editing the NPC’s dialogue and rewards because i can get really creative with things like that. :]

Yeah editing strings of text keeps me entertained for hours. Sometimes I’ll stay up all night because it is so fun.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 or 508?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I prefer 508.
It’s easier because it’s packaged, unlike most 317 servers, and it’ easy to understand. However, it can be hard to change from 317 to 508.
My favorite thing to code in it are things that no one has coded before. Examples: My barbarian assault, real party room, etc.

Read full topic
